bibl.title: The Veterans and Praefectus Castrorum of the Il Traiana A.D. 157.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: AJP 77 (1956) pp. 359-375. Discusses three points in the Latin inscription from the Roman camp at Nicopolis near Alexandria (A.E. 1955, 238): the origins of the veterans, the praefectus castrorum in Egypt, and the rank of the officer with this title.

bibl.title: James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers

bibl.seg: Gilliam James Frank, The Veterans and Praefectus Castrorum of the Il Traiana A.D. 157.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 145-161; - 443.

Reproduit de: AJP 77 (1956) pp. 359-375. Discusses three points in the Latin inscription from the Roman camp at Nicopolis near Alexandria (A.E. 1955, 238): the origins of the veterans, the praefectus castrorum in Egypt, and the rank of the officer with this title.
